shipping.question: When will my package arrive?
shipping.answer: Your order ships within 1-3 business days. Delivery time varies by city/country.

returns.question: How does the return process work?
returns.answer: You can request a return within 14 days after delivery. See our Returns page for details.

payment.question: Which payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, wire transfers, and cash on delivery.

account.question: Do I need to create an account?
account.answer: No, you can checkout as a guest; creating an account helps track your order history.
